attributes.action: ‪Can we settle on this country remaining in EU the rest be Brexitland?
attributes.background:
‪Can we settle on this country remaining in EU? The United Kingdom Of Scotland, Northern Ireland, Gibraltar, Liverpool, Manchester, Newcastle, Norwich, Brighton and Hove, Leeds, Bristol, Bath, Cambridge, London, Exeter, South Hams and The Isles of Scilly?‬
The rest can be independent Brexitland
